Semantic meaning: List container; groups together all list elements that belong together
Possible and semantically meaningful par: Document, Part, Art, Sect, Div, BlockQuote, Index

Semantic meaning: Container of a list entry; can contain an L to create multi-level lists

Comes from the term “label” and represents the numbering or bullet character within a list. It’s not actually a block-level structure element and can also be used in other elements such as TOCI or Caption.
Contains the contents of a list entry
